summary.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

span.span: Implements management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization.

summary.span: This class cannot be inherited.

span.span: This class cannot be inherited.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此类提供了几个静态方法和属性公开为 Web 部件的个性化设置的管理功能。This class provides several static methods and properties that expose management and administrative functionality for Web Parts personalization. 这些方法适用于配置中的默认个性化设置提供程序Web 部件控件的控件。These methods apply to the default personalization provider configured in the control for a Web Parts control. 如果你需要管理充当个性化设置提供程序的多个数据存储，你应直接在单独的个性化设置提供程序类上使用方法。If you need to administer several data stores that are acting as personalization providers, you should use the methods on the individual personalization provider classes directly. 请注意，集合的配置提供程序，个性化控制可从静态属性。Note that the collection of configured personalization providers for a control is available from the static property. 务必要注意个性化设置将失败，如果 Web 应用程序未运行在默认信任级别的或更高版本 (你可以在 Web.config 文件中使用设置自定义信任级别``元素)。It is important to be aware that personalization will fail if your Web application does not run at the default trust level of or higher (you can set custom trust levels in a Web.config file using the `` element). 和类这两个信任级别的检查初始化时。The and classes both check for a trust level of when they are initialized. 如果你配置你的应用程序运行在的信任级别的，并使用默认提供程序来管理你的应用程序，个性化数据将应用程序尝试访问个性化数据的第一个时间失败，因为在中运行 ASP.NET 工作进程信任没有调入的各个类中所必需的权限命名空间。If you configure your application to run at a trust level of , and you use the default provider to manage the personalization data for your application, the first time that the application tries to access personalization data, it will fail because an ASP.NET worker process running in trust does not have the permissions necessary to call into the various classes in the namespace. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用中的几种方法类。The following code example demonstrates how to use several methods in the class. 此示例包含引用一个名为的 Web 部件用户控件的.aspx 页`Persadmin.ascx`。This example consists of an .aspx page that references a Web Parts user control named `Persadmin.ascx`. 以下代码提供了此示例的.aspx 文件。The following code provides the .aspx file for the example. [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#7](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/defaultcs.aspx#7)] 此代码提供`Persadmin.ascx`控件。This code provides the `Persadmin.ascx` control. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). [!code-aspx-csharp[WebParts_PersAdmin#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_WebNet/WebParts_PersAdmin/CS/PersAdmin.ascx#1)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 应用程序名称会影响数据检索和保存个性化设置提供程序，并允许多个应用程序通过设置相同的应用程序名称，共享数据或者数据通过指定的同一数据库中的不同分区应用程序名称。The application name affects the data retrieved and saved by the personalization provider, and allows for multiple applications to either share data by setting an identical application name, or partition data within the same database by specifying different application names. 中的 Web.config 或 System.config 文件的个性化设置提供程序部分可以找到应用程序名称。The application name is found in the personalization provider section of the Web.config or System.config file. > [!CAUTION] > 因为一个默认配置文件提供程序实例用于满足的所有请求对象，您可以有多个请求并发执行，并尝试设置属性值。Because a single default profile provider instance is used for all the requests served by an object, you can have multiple requests executing concurrently and attempting to set the property value. 属性不是线程安全用于多个写操作，并更改属性值可能会导致多个用户的应用程序的意外行为。The property is not thread-safe for multiple writes, and changing the property value can result in unexpected behavior for multiple users of an application. 建议你避免代码，以允许用户设置属性所需除外。It is recommended that you avoid code to allow users to set the property unless required. 应用程序的示例设置属性可能需要是管理应用程序管理多个应用程序的配置文件数据。An example of an application where setting the property might be required is an administrative application that manages profile data for multiple applications. 此类应用程序应为单用户应用程序和不是 Web 应用程序。Such an application should be a single-user application and not a Web application.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例，每个用户个性化状态信息其中`pathToMatch`参数值与匹配的页上，路径`usernameToMatch`匹配具有与程序关联的个性化数据的用户名称页上，和用户被视为处于非活动状态。This method returns a collection of instances, per-user personalization state information where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page, and the users are considered inactive. 换而言之，对于每个返回记录用户的属性的值是否小于或等于`userInactiveSinceDate`。In other words, for each returned record the user's property value is less than or equal to `userInactiveSinceDate`. 返回的集合只包含实例。The returned collection contains only instances. 此方法将查询通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。This method passes query wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 当前依赖于每个提供程序处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符的方式是支持通配符。Support for wildcard characters is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同样，对部分用户名通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称属性将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按组合的路径和用户名称的升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 提供商确定的顺序集合中的对象。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`是，则此方法的返回的值不等于。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 同时`pathToMatch`和`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以包含逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许为通配字符的逗号。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can include commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

personalization state information where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page, and the users are considered inactive. 换而言之，对于每个返回记录用户的属性的值是否小于或等于`userInactiveSinceDate`。In other words, for each returned record the user's property value is less than or equal to `userInactiveSinceDate`. 集合仅包含实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符字符传递给基础个性化设置提供程序，数据存储区处理这些字符的因此方式取决于提供程序如何处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同样，对部分用户名通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称属性将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按组合的路径和用户名称的升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 提供商确定的顺序集合中的对象。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 如果`userInactiveSinceDate`是，则此方法的返回的值不等于。If `userInactiveSinceDate` is , then the returned values from this method are equivalent to . 同时`pathToMatch`和`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以具有逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许为通配字符的逗号。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. 返回的数据受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录和`pageSize`控制要返回的记录数。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已设置为 0 和`pageSize`设置为 25，返回的数据将是前 25 个项。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已设置为 1 和`pageSize`设置为 25，返回的数据将是项 26 到 50 个。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回的可用的记录总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例 where`pathToMatch`值匹配的路径已共享个性化状态数据的页。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` value matches the path of a page that has shared personalization state data. 集合仅包含实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符字符传递给基础个性化设置提供程序，数据存储区处理这些字符的因此方式取决于提供程序如何处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按组合的路径和用户名称的升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 提供商确定的顺序集合中的对象。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`参数可以为`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，将忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 提供商确定的顺序集合中的对象。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. `pathToMatch`参数可以为`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，将忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. 返回的数据受到`pageIndex`和`pageSize`，其中`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录和`pageSize`控制要返回的记录数。The data returned is constrained by `pageIndex` and `pageSize`, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records to return. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已设置为 0 和`pageSize`设置为 25，返回的数据将是前 25 个项。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已设置为 1 和`pageSize`设置为 25，返回的数据将是项 26 到 50 个。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回的可用的记录总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的集合实例 where`pathToMatch`参数值与匹配的页上，路径和`usernameToMatch`匹配的用户名称，具有与该页面关联的个性化数据。This method returns a collection of instances where the `pathToMatch` parameter value matches the path of a page, and `usernameToMatch` matches a user name that has personalization data associated with that page. 集合仅包含实例。The collection contains only instances. 此方法将参数通配符字符传递给基础个性化设置提供程序，数据存储区处理这些字符的因此方式取决于提供程序如何处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符。This method passes parameter wildcard characters to the underlying personalization provider, so how the data store handles these characters depends on how the provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". 同样，对部分用户名通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Likewise, a wildcard search on a partial user name could have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称属性将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the property would look like "John%". 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按组合的路径和用户名称的升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 提供商确定的顺序集合中的对象。The ordering of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider. 同时`pathToMatch`和`usernameToMatch`可以是`null`。Both `pathToMatch` and `usernameToMatch` can be `null`. `usernameToMatch`参数可以具有逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许为通配字符的逗号。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用 方法。The following code example demonstrates how to use the method. 完整的示例可在类概述主题。The complete example can be found in the class overview topic. > [!IMPORTANT] > 此示例具有一个接受用户输入的文本框，这是一个潜在的安全威胁。This example has a text box that accepts user input, which is a potential security threat. 默认情况下，ASP.NET 网页验证用户输入是否不包含脚本或 HTML 元素。By default, ASP.NET Web pages validate that user input does not include script or HTML elements. 有关详细信息，请参阅[脚本侵入概述](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07)。For more information, see [Script Exploits Overview](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/772c7312-211a-4eb3-8d6e-eec0aa1dcc07). remarks.format: ## Remarks 返回的集合中的项主要基于作用域，并且然后对应于该作用域的记录会进一步减小为子集基于`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数。The items in the collection returned are based primarily on scope, and then the records corresponding to that scope are further reduced to a subset based on the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters. 返回的集合包含以下任一仅限，实例或仅限实例。The collection returned contains either instances only, or instances only. 返回的项都受`pageIndex`和`pageSize`参数，其中`pageIndex`控制要返回哪些记录和`pageSize`控制返回的记录数量。The items returned are constrained by the `pageIndex` and `pageSize` parameters, where `pageIndex` controls which records to return and `pageSize` controls the number of records returned. 例如，如果`pageIndex`已设置为 0 和`pageSize`设置为 25，返回的数据将是前 25 个项。For example, if `pageIndex` was set to 0 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be the first 25 entries. 如果`pageIndex`已设置为 1 和`pageSize`设置为 25，返回的数据将是项 26 到 50 个。If `pageIndex` was set to 1 and `pageSize` was set to 25, the data returned would be entries 26 to 50. `totalRecords`参数返回的可用的记录总数。The `totalRecords` parameter returns the total number of records that are available. 使用默认的个性化设置提供程序， -派生的对象返回按字母顺序，并按组合的路径和用户名称的升序排序。Using the default personalization provider, the -derived objects are returned in alphabetical order, and sorted by a combination of path and user name in ascending order. 提供商确定的顺序集合中的对象。The order of the objects in the collection is determined by the provider.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的记录，页面匹配指定`pathtoMatch`参数和用户的属性的值是否小于或等于属性值。This method returns records where the page matches the specified `pathtoMatch` parameter and the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 如果设置为，返回的所有用户的个性化信息计数。If is set to , a count of all users' personalization information is returned. 请注意，`pathToMatch`参数可以包含通配符字符。Note that the `pathToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 该方法将通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。The method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 通配符的支持是当前依赖于每个提供程序处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符的方式。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，你可以执行通配符搜索部分路径带有通配符字符开头，结束时，或在搜索字符串文本的中间显示属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, you can perform a wildcard search on a partial path with the wildcard character appearing at the beginning, the end, or the middle of the search string text in the property. 例如，若要查找以"~/vdir"开头的所有路径属性将设置为"~/vdir%"。For example, to find all paths that start with "~/vdir", the property would be set to "~/vdir%". `pathToMatch`参数可以为`null`。The `pathToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，将忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法返回的每个用户数的计数个性化设置项在基础数据存储中对应于给定`usernameToMatch`。This method returns a count of the number of per-user personalization items in the underlying data store that exist for the given `usernameToMatch`. 请注意，`usernameToMatch`参数可以包含通配符字符。Note that the `usernameToMatch` parameter can include wildcard characters. 此方法将通配符字符传递给基础数据存储区。This method passes wildcard characters to the underlying data store. 通配符的支持是当前依赖于每个提供程序处理如星号 （\*）、 百分号 （%） 或下划线 (_) 字符的方式。Wildcard character support is currently dependent on how each provider handles characters such as an asterisk (\*), a percent symbol (%), or an underscore (_). 通常情况下，对于符合 SQL 数据存储区中，部分用户名的通配符搜索可以显示的文本字符串中的任意位置的通配符字符属性。Normally, for SQL-compliant data stores, a wildcard search on a partial user name can have the wildcard character appear at any point in the text string of the property. 例如，若要查找与"John"开头的所有用户名称参数将如下所示"John %"。For example, to find all user names that start with "John", the parameter would look like "John%". `usernameToMatch`参数可以为`null`。The `usernameToMatch` parameter can be `null`. 如果设置为`null`，在执行查询时，将忽略此参数。If set to `null`, the parameter is ignored when performing queries. `usernameToMatch`参数可拥有逗号 （，），因为某些数据存储，例如那些运行 Microsoft SQL Server，允许为通配字符的逗号。The `usernameToMatch` parameter is allowed to have commas (,) because some data stores, such as those running Microsoft SQL Server, allow commas as wildcard characters.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置所有与指定的路径、 基础数据存储区中的每个用户状态，用户的属性的值是否小于或等于属性值。This method resets all per-user state in the underlying data store associated with the specified path, where the user's property value is less than or equal to the property value. 对于数据存储区，需要多个行的数据存储个性化状态页，或用户和页组合，个性化设置状态的计数可能会与不同的重置行的计数。For data stores that require more than one row of data to store personalization state for a page, or for a user and page combination, the count of reset rows might differ from the count of personalization state. 如果基础提供程序公开识别事务的数据存储区中的数据，此方法在单个事务中执行其操作。If the underlying provider exposes data from a transaction-aware data store, this method performs its operations in a single transaction. 它不是尝试重置不存在共享的状态错误。It is not an error to attempt to reset nonexistent shared state. 如果是，此方法有效地重置指定的路径的基础数据存储中的所有每用户数据。If is , this method effectively resets all per-user data in the underlying data store for the specified path.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法将重置基于基础数据存储区中的个性化数据集合中包含的对象。This method resets personalization data in the underlying data store, based on the objects contained in the collection. 你可以使用此方法有选择地删除混合的共享和每个用户数据基于集合的内容。You can use this method to selectively delete a mixture of shared and per-user data based on the collection's contents. 对象表示，则将重置共享的数据页;对象指示每个用户数据，将重置特定页。 objects indicate that shared data for a page will be reset; objects indicate that per-user data for a specific page will be reset. > [!NOTE] > 此方法不能保证所有重置发生在单个事务中，因为集合指向随机数据集的个性化设置。This method does not guarantee that all resets occur within a single transaction because the collection points to random sets of personalization data. 它不是一个集合以包含引用不存在的数据的对象的错误。It is not an error for the collection to contain objects that reference nonexistent data.
